snippet: Despite efforts to improve the quality of tap water, Mexico is the world’s largest per capita consumer of bottled water, using it even for bathing babies.
abstract: Mexico City Journal; Mexico is the world’s largest per capita consumer of bottled water, using it even for bathing babies; skepticism about the quality of tap water remains widespread, despite continuing efforts to improve it.
lead_paragraph: Despite efforts to improve the quality of tap water, Mexico is the world’s largest per capita consumer of bottled water, using it even for bathing babies.

headline.seo: Mexicans Struggle to Kick Bottled-Water Habit
headline.main: Bottled-Water Habit Keeps Tight Grip on Mexicans
headline.print_headline: Bottled-Water Habit Keeps Tight Grip on Mexicans
